name: 12 Animals - Zodiac
description:
Rat (鼠) - Ox (牛) - Tiger (虎) - Rabbit (兔) - Dragon (龍) - Snake (蛇) - Horse (馬) - Goat (羊) - Monkey (猴) - Rooster (雞) - Dog (狗) - Pig (豬)
--------------------------------------
Let find the Pig (豬) to win the game, reach a high score and challenge your friends!
--------------------------------------
I wish you to have a
Sweetest Sunday
Marvelous Monday
Tasty Tuesday
Wonderful Wednesday
Thankful Thursday,
Fridendly Friday,
Successful Saturday
Have a great year
--------------------------------------
Enjoy and play the game
